data.title: Hospitals and clinics in Brown County, Ohio
data.meta_description: 15 key healthcare facilities in Brown County, Ohio, including hospitals and clinics with 24/7 operations and emergency services, are detailed in this GIS dataset.
data.text:
Professionals working in geographical information systems who are focusing on Brown County, Ohio, will find our dataset on hospitals and clinics particularly useful. This comprehensive dataset includes detailed information on 15 healthcare facilities, highlighting features like 24/7 operational hours, emergency services availability, and contact information. Notable entries include Mercy Health â Clermont Hospital, Anderson Hospital, Bethesda North Hospital, and Adams County Regional Medical Center, each equipped for around-the-clock medical services and accessibility. Whether updating maps, conducting accessibility analyses, or integrating healthcare facility data into broader GIS projects, this dataset offers valuable insights for effective spatial analysis in the healthcare sector.

Included in our Hospitals and clinics in Brown County, Ohio dataset are a variety of features, including: â¢ Mercy Health â Clermont Hospital â¢ Anderson Hospital â¢ Bethesda North Hospital â¢ Adams County Regional Medical Center â¢ Meadowview Regional Medical Center â¢ Mercy Health Mount Orab Medical Center â¢ Highland District Hospital â¢ Pendleton County Outpatient Service â¢ Mercy Health â¢ VA Clinic â¢ Doctors Urgent Care Office â¢ Brown County Recovery Services â¢ Hometown Urgent Care â¢ SOMC Family Health Center â¢ Melinda Y. Utilize versatile tools to modify, analyze, and export data in GeoPackage format. Furthermore, explore our rich archive of pre-assembled GIS data, presenting a multitude of supplementary datasets curated for Brown County, Ohio.
